attributes.action: Request the sovereign right of Hong Kong back to UK
attributes.additional_details: PRC didn’t give us the right to vote for Chief Executive as he promised . Also China is keep on expropriating Hong Konger’s right obviously . These are something not supposed to happen within “one country, two system”
attributes.background: PRC had broke the promises made in “Sino British Joint Declaration”for many times,please do not tolerate those detestable behaviour made from People’s Republic Of China

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the people of Hong Kong.
